data.actual_result: For many languages the wrong thousands separator is shown (most of the time `,` instead `.` or a space).
data.expected_result: You should see the correct thousands separator based on your system language.
data.short_description: Wrong thousands separator for some languages shown
data.steps_to_repro: - Use any system language that doesn't use a `,` as a thousands separator (e.g. German, also works with others) - Open the search - Search for anything that has more than 1000 results - Observe the search result count and look for the thousands separator
